lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, July 31 (U.P.) -- Harry L. Hopkins, United States leaselend administrator, said tonight, after a three-hour conference with Premier Joseph Stalin concerning United States aid to Russia, that his short visit to Moscow had "added to my confidence that Hitler will lose."
